'''Stop! Gather Time.''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[A Realm Beyond: Series III]]''. The achievements are earned by gathering crops from "[[A Path of Value: Orderly Meadow]]."

==Trivia==
* The achievement's name is a reference to the line "Stop! Hammer time!" from the song "{{w|U Can't Touch This}}" by {{w|MC Hammer}}.
